name: math
description: Mathematical assistant that calculates Fibonacci numbers and other math operations using function tools.
author: Agent Orcha

name: call-center-analyst
description: Analyzes call center transcripts using GraphRAG for entity-level and thematic insights across agent interactions, customer data, and outcomes.
author: Agent Orcha

name: sentiment-structured
description: Performs sentiment analysis with structured JSON output. Returns sentiment category, confidence score, and key influencing keywords.
author: Agent Orcha

name: weather
description: Fetch weather information using wttr.in and Open-Meteo APIs. Free, no authentication required.
author: Agent Orcha

name: spotify-player
description: Control Spotify playback via the spogo CLI. Enables search, play, pause, skip, volume, and status commands.
author: Agent Orcha

name: wacli
description: Send WhatsApp messages using the wacli CLI. Supports text, media, group messaging, and connection management.
author: Agent Orcha

name: skill-creator
description: Meta-skill that guides the creation of new SKILL.md files with best practices, format specs, and examples.
author: Agent Orcha

name: example-workflow
description: Multi-agent orchestration demo with sequential steps chaining call-center-analyst, math, and sentiment agents.
author: Agent Orcha

name: langgraph-research
description: Autonomous research workflow using LangGraph with automatic tool and agent discovery. Supports ReAct loop execution.
author: Agent Orcha

name: calculator
description: Basic arithmetic operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide) with input validation and division-by-zero handling.
author: Agent Orcha

name: text-formatter
description: Text transformations including uppercase, lowercase, title case, reverse, and alternating case formatting.
author: Agent Orcha

name: example-knowledge
description: Vector store for semantic search over call center transcripts. Uses character-based splitting with memory storage.
author: Agent Orcha

name: github
description: Official GitHub MCP server. Provides tools for repos, issues, pull requests, code search, and more.
author: GitHub

name: notion
description: Official Notion MCP server. Read, create, and modify Notion pages, databases, and blocks.
author: Notion

name: webflow
description: Official Webflow MCP server. Interact with Webflow Data API and Designer API for CMS, pages, and visual elements.
author: Webflow

name: fetch
description: Reference MCP server for fetching web content. Converts HTML to markdown for efficient LLM consumption.
author: Anthropic

name: edgeone-pages
description: Deploy HTML content and full-stack projects to EdgeOne Pages and get a public URL instantly.
author: Tencent EdgeOne
